summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Agentic RAT Countermeasure System v2.0. All backend APIs (30/30) and frontend features working perfectly. AI-powered autonomous agent with GPT-4o integration functional. Dashboard displays tactical interface with real-time countermeasure monitoring and war log tracking.

minor_fixes_applied.issue: Missing is_active and mode fields in response
minor_fixes_applied.fix_applied: Added default value fallback in get_agent_state endpoint

passed_tests: All 30 backend API endpoints (status, scan, agent/run, agent/state, detections, war-log, countermeasures, stats, threat-intelligence)
Dashboard loads with countermeasure stats (Active: 0, Evicted: 25, Mutations: 22, Countermeasures: 48, Success Rate: 85%)
Agent status indicator shows AUTONOMOUS mode with active status
SCAN button triggers scan and agent automatically (agent_triggered: true)
ENGAGE button manually triggers agent cycle (proper button state management)
War Log tab displays 50+ battle activity entries with event types (detection, analysis, countermeasure, mutation, eviction, learning)
Detections tab shows active vs evicted threats sections with proper categorization
Tactics tab shows countermeasure effectiveness chart and technique cards
Network activity chart with live data visualization (connections, suspicious, blocked)
Agent stats showing learning iterations (7), tactics learned (9), last action tracking
Recent battle activity preview with color-coded event types and AI decisions
All 4 main tabs (Overview, War Log, Detections, Tactics) navigation working
AI Analysis integration with Emergent LLM (GPT-4o) returning strategy decisions
Countermeasure techniques (6 available: fault_injection, resource_starvation, network_isolation, process_termination, memory_corruption, decoy_deployment)
Threat intelligence system with 14+ learned intelligence entries
Real-time statistics with 85%+ success rate tracking
No error messages or console errors found

success_percentage.frontend: 100% (all UI components, tabs, and integrations working)
